name: @internal/backstage-plugin-eda-common
description: Common functionalities for the eda plugin

scripts.build: mkdir -p ../../dist-types/plugins/eda-common/src/schema && cp -R src/schema/* ../../dist-types/plugins/eda-common/src/schema/ && backstage-cli package build && mkdir -p dist/schema && cp -R src/schema/* dist/schema/
